title: Blocking Players
body: Ive been doing my promos the last few days and have come across many players that have had connection problems, people that troll by choosing a role that has been taken already, not playing a proper support role by stealing cs etc and I would like to discuss the option of having a block button that bans the player from your future games. Or even if you report a player so you dont have to play with them again.

replies.body:
Connection issues were likely caused by a server wide live maintenance. 
Ranked is where all the trolling happens. You can still be a successful ADC with a 'support' that takes CS and doesn't ward, it just takes more skill and patience. I believe that blocking a player lessens the likelihood of being paired up with them again, but does not deplete the chance completely due to limited player pool in each skill bracket (I may be wrong).
